snippet.title: Lost Isle - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Isle is an open-world survival MMO game developed by Wunder Entertainment. Players will explore a fully procedurally generated world to craft items, cooperatively work with friends, or pillage them for self-gain. Build structures to loot and harvest your pickings or siege and plunder the precious valuables of other players. Lost Isle is coming soon to PC.

#IGN #Gaming #LostIsle
